pages.text: polymorph must be one of the most versatile potion effects. when a polymorph potion is consumed, the target will change its form into the target of the taglock used.$(br2)the brew can be made into a splash potion or similar variants, just like other brews.

pages.title: polymorph
pages.text: intensity does not have an effect on this potion.$(br2)this potion only works if created from a taglock of another player.
